summary: This mod adds a new set of armor and weapons. The armor is white with a light blue glow to it, it is also light armor and is a bit better than its daedric counterparts excluding the shield (the shield is still heavy. The weapons are the same as daedric with the same colour-sheme as the armor. The crafting is the same as daedric (although it will be
